cst8284.triviatime

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • cst8284.triviatime.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handles everything to do with the trivia file chosen for the game, by setting the array of QA objects, to returning the array, to reading the trivia file, and getting the absolute path of the trivia file
    Since:
    Java 8
    Version:
    2
    Author:
    Mary Anne Bernardino
    See Also:
    Stage, FileChooser, FileChooser.ExtensionFilter, File, FileInputStream, IOException, ObjectInputStream, java.util.ArrayList;
